altTitles.en: ラブロマンス・スウィートキス

description.en:
1-3: Romance  
Handsome features, magnificent physique: the returning elite of America, Saeki, a bespectacled beauty of the Systems Department. While Kurahashi is the perpetrator of a crime, his pride is unforgivable. He has a ruthless attitude, so why does his hot gaze stir up Saeki's heart?  
  
4: Rainy Weather, 1 In The Afternoon  
Yoshizawa and Mori work for the same company but in different departments, though they often meet up on the rooftop for breaks. Mori always gives Yoshizawa candy, but it isn't long before Yoshizawa is craving more than sweets from his ever cheery co-worker…  
  
5: The First Civil Servant  
A history lesson from our favorite lawyers.  
  
6: Throbbing Kiss And Love  
Independent lawyer Oosawa is surprised to see that the new prosecutor is Suzuki, his old college classmate. Oosawa had forgotten kissing Suzuki in a drunken moment, but now he can't forget how sweetly Suzuki kissed him back.  
  
7: Children Can Never Understand  
Fukaya is asked by a friend to help tutor intense student Kuroda. Fukaya is still brooding over his 6 month old break-up with his ex, but Kuroda is quickly getting under the older man's skin with his perceptive attention and lack of personal boundaries.
description.pl:
Do firmy, w której pracuje Kurahashi, dołącza Saeki - bratanek szefa. Jest młody, przystojny i inteligentny. Nic dziwnego, że wszyscy mężczyźni z firmy są o niego zazdrośni. No, prawie wszyscy. Owym wyjątkiem jest właśnie Kurahashi, który bynajmniej nie czuje niechęci do nowego kolegi. Gdy więc dostaje od niego zaproszenie na drinka, zgadza się bez większego namysłu. Ale czy jest rzeczywiście dobry wybór?  
Manga zawiera także kilka osobnych one-shotów.
